T02D2176:31a-1: ga na tsakra bi dhi: bod skad du /
T02D2176:31a-2: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga / dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2176:31a-3: tshogs chen khyad par bsags pa dang //
T02D2176:31a-4: dam tshig nyams pa bskang ba dang //
T02D2176:31a-5: sgrib sbyang mchog ni thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2176:31a-6: rnal 'byor lugs mthun bdag gis bshad //
T02D2176:31a-7: tshogs ni gnyis su shes par bya'o //
T02D2176:31b-0: @31b phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad pa'i //
T02D2176:31b-1: de yang 'khor lo bskor dang mchod pa brtsam //
T02D2176:31b-2: phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo //
T02D2176:31b-3: dgug dang bskrad dang mnan pa dang //
T02D2176:31b-4: gsad pa la sogs tshar gcad pa'o //
T02D2176:31b-5: de sgrub rnal 'byor bstan pa ni //
T02D2176:31b-6: sngags pa gcig tu rtog byed dang//
T02D2176:31b-7: dus rnams kun du rtse gcig ldan //
T02D2176:31b-8: rgyud rnams kyi ni snying po shes //
T02D2176:31b-9: de nyid bcu ni mchog tu rig / zab cing rgya chen chos la mos //
T02D2176:31b-10: yid ni shin tu 'jam pa dang //
T02D2176:31b-11: bsnyen bkur ldan zhing 'jigs pa med //
T02D2176:31b-12: nga rgyal med cing gshegs la brtson //
T02D2176:31b-13: brda dang phyag rgya'i mchod pa yi //
T02D2176:31b-14: lan dang sbyor pa sogs la mkhas //
T02D2176:31b-15: gsang thub tshod rig lus ngag gzo //
T02D2176:31b-16: de la sogs pa'i cho ga mkhas //
T02D2176:31b-17: gu ru la sogs lha dang bstun //
T02D2176:31b-18: de steng las kyi rnal 'byor gnyis //
T02D2176:31b-19: byan po byan mo gsol ka gsum //
T02D2176:31b-20: phyi mtshams nang mtshams rol mo pa //
T02D2176:31b-21: de ni rnal 'byor rgyas pa'i tshad //
T02D2176:31b-22: lha steng las kyi skar ma dang //
T02D2176:31b-23: mtshan ma nyid ni bsdus pa'o //
T02D2176:31b-24: lnga pa yan chad shin tu bsdus //
T02D2176:31b-25: 'khor lo bsdus rgyas mkhas pas bya //
T02D2176:31b-26: mchod pa bzhi gsum gnyis su bya //
T02D2176:31b-27: de yi rim pa'ang gong bzhin du //
T02D2176:31b-28: bsod nams rim pa'ang de bzhin thob //
T02D2176:31b-30: yang na mchog 'dod pa dang thun mong ni //
T02D2176:31b-31: grags ma grangs kyi rim pa yis //
T02D2176:31b-32: mchod pa'i tshul gyis rim pas bya //
T02D2176:31b-33: byin gyis brlabs sam rigs mthun par //
T02D2176:31b-34: nyams dga' yid 'jug gnas dag tu //
T02D2176:31b-35: 'khor khang sum rim dang po yi //
T02D2176:31b-36: sgo bzhi gnyis pa lho la gsum pa shar //
T02D2176:31b-37: de yi thun mong khyad par ni //
T02D2176:31b-39: rim gsum gyen du brtsigs pa ni //
T02D2176:31b-40: lus 'dod pa dang phyi ma'i lugs //
T02D2176:31b-42: dur khrod mtsho gling 'jigs pa'i gnas //
T02D2176:31b-44: char gcad don du gong bzhin bya //
T02D2176:31b-45: dus ni rgyun nam lo'am zlar //
T02D2176:31b-46: khyad par bzhi gsum gnyis dang gcig / bcu gnyis bzhi ru dam tshig go //
T02D2176:31b-47: de ltar ma byas mkha' 'gros gsod //
T02D2176:32a-2: yon tan sbyor ba'i rim pa dang //
T02D2176:32a-3: sgrub po 'dod pa'i rim pa yis //
T02D2176:32a-4: gong gi khyad par shes par bya //
T02D2176:32a-5: phyi ltar ba yi rnam lngas byug / nang ni
T02D2176:32a-6: bdud rtsi rnam lngas byug / phyi ni mdzes pa'i
T02D2176:32a-7: rgyan rnams bris // nang ni dur khrod chas kyis brgyan ;
T02D2176:32a-8: / dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri //
T02D2176:32a-9: ngag gi brda skad thabs gsum gyis //
T02D2176:32a-10: rnal 'byor rnams ni bsdu bar bya //
T02D2176:32a-11: dbyug sngon gyis ni lus ngag brda //
T02D2176:32a-12: bum pa nas bzung phyi nang gsang //
T02D2176:32a-13: dril nas dbye gsal rim pas bya //
T02D2176:32a-14: slob dpon mdun du 'khon gcugs sbyang ;
T02D2176:32a-15: / las kyi sems dpa' gral la dgod //
T02D2176:32a-16: rgyan cha gan la go bgor gnas //
T02D2176:32a-17: slob dpon gyis ni byin brlabs shing //
T02D2176:32a-18: las kyi sems mas rtags gsum gdab //
T02D2176:32a-19: rang gis lhag pa'i nga rgyal bya //
T02D2176:32a-20: gar mas mandala mchod pa rnams //
T02D2176:32a-21: rim par byas nas gsol ba gdab //
T02D2176:32a-22: bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom //
T02D2176:32a-23: so so'i lha yi nga rgyal bya //
T02D2176:32a-24: de ltar mi shes lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2176:32a-25: de ltar byas nas gtso bo'i brdas //
T02D2176:32a-26: karma la ni bskul bar bya //
T02D2176:32a-28: tshogs kyi bye brag brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2176:32a-29: 'gying bag tshul gyis drang bar bya //
T02D2176:32a-30: tshogs kyi dbye ba bstan pa ni //
T02D2176:32a-31: rtsa ba lnga las rtsa lngar gyur //
T02D2176:32a-32: thun mong du ni brgya bya la //
T02D2176:32a-33: rnal 'byor zab mo'i spyod pa yin //
T02D2176:32a-34: sha yi bye brag nyi shu lnga //
T02D2176:32a-35: btung ba'i bye brag de bzhin no //
T02D2176:32a-36: sman gyi bye brag nyi shu dang //
T02D2176:32a-37: bshos dang dkar gyi bye brag kyang //
T02D2176:32a-38: phyed mar byas pa'i sum cu yin ;
T02D2176:32a-39: / spos kyi bye brag brgyad du bstan //
T02D2176:32a-40: de nas bsdus pa phyed du bstan //
T02D2176:32a-41: shin tu bsdus pa de yi phyed //
T02D2176:32a-43: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D2176:32a-44: bcu dang lnga dang gsum du bya //
T02D2176:32a-46: bsod nams che chung rim pa de'o ;
T02D2176:32a-47: / tshogs de slob dpon byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2176:32a-48: rlung gis me sbar mtshan ldan dros //
T02D2176:32a-49: de nyid gsum gyi las byas la //
T02D2176:32a-50: bdud rtsi bab cing rdo rjes dkrugs //
T02D2176:32a-51: bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'od du zhu //
T02D2176:32a-52: btung ba'i byin rlabs la sogs kyang //
T02D2176:32a-53: man ngag bzhin du byin brlabs la//
T02D2176:32b-0: @32b bdud rtsi mchod pa phyogs bkram la //
T02D2176:32b-1: dang po las kyi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2176:32b-2: mdun du lha bskyed spyan drangs bstim //
T02D2176:32b-4: de nas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2176:32b-5: de 'og lcags kyu lnga po dang //
T02D2176:32b-6: glu dang gar gyi mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2176:32b-7: h'um gi glu blangs mchod pa ni //
T02D2176:32b-8: nyi shu yang ni bya bar gsungs //
T02D2176:32b-9: bstod cing rol mo'i mchod pa 'bul //
T02D2176:32b-10: de nas rnal 'byor rnams la mchod //
T02D2176:32b-11: lhag ma mkha' 'gro rnams la mchod //
T02D2176:32b-12: mandala sngon po byas nas ni //
T02D2176:32b-13: bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab //
T02D2176:32b-14: me tog sngon po'i tshom bu bya //
T02D2176:32b-15: sa la gnas pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D2176:32b-16: bskyed cing spyan drangs bstim byas la //
T02D2176:32b-17: byin gyis brlabs la mchod pa bya //
T02D2176:32b-18: lhag ma kha chus btab nas ni //
T02D2176:32b-19: sbyang dang spro ba bsdus byas la //
T02D2176:32b-21: khrag gis byug cing me tog dgram //
T02D2176:32b-22: bshud glu brda yis spyan drangs nas //
T02D2176:32b-23: rnal 'byor skra bshig thal bas byug / rgyan chas gon la rtags rnams gdab //
T02D2176:32b-24: lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas nas //
T02D2176:32b-25: rdo rje'i glu blangs rol mo brdung //
T02D2176:32b-26: mchod cing bstod nas mthol bshags bya //
T02D2176:32b-27: phrin las bcol la gshegs su gsol //
T02D2176:32b-28: tshogs kyi sbyor ka'i phrin las kyis //
T02D2176:32b-30: slob dpon bha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
T02D2176:32b-32: * // zab ba don gyi cho ga rnams //
T02D2176:32b-33: rin chen lta bu'i gang zag la //
T02D2176:32b-34: zab phyir man ngag bkol nas bstan //
T02D2176:32b-35: mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2176:32b-36: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2176:32b-37: thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no //
T02D2176:32b-38: khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni //
T02D2176:32b-39: rin chen phub pa dgu rim mam //
T02D2176:32b-40: bdun rim lnga rim sum rim ni //
T02D2176:32b-41: mu stegs nyan thos skye bo yis //
T02D2176:32b-42: skrag 'gyur log spyod spyad byed gsum //
T02D2176:32b-43: de dag spang phyir gong bzhin bstan //
T02D2176:32b-44: rgyal rigs rje'u rigs bram ze'i rigs //
T02D2176:32b-45: bu mo mtshan dang ldan pa ni //
T02D2176:32b-46: mtshan rnams bcu po rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2176:32b-47: shes rab che dang snying rje che //
T02D2176:32b-48: dad pa la sogs che ba dang //
T02D2176:32b-49: rnal 'byor ldan pa phyag rgya mkhas //
T02D2176:33a-2: de lta'i rnal 'byor nyung yang lnga //
T02D2176:33a-3: mang bar gyur na rnal 'byor kyang //
T02D2176:33a-4: bskyed de de ltar rigs par spyad //
T02D2176:33a-5: lnga gnyis zung du gnas pa las //
T02D2176:33a-6: bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pas //
T02D2176:33a-7: nang gi mchod pa brtsam par bya //
T02D2176:33a-8: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brtsam //
T02D2176:33a-9: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D2176:33a-10: dga' ba'i ye shes bcu drug ni //
T02D2176:33a-11: 'khor lo'i tshul las lhan cig skyed //
T02D2176:33a-12: ye shes 'khor lo zhes su grags //
T02D2176:33a-13: yang na sprul pa'i 'khor lo la //
T02D2176:33a-14: thig le phra mo bsam pa ni //
T02D2176:33a-15: rnal 'byor pha yin rtsa rnams ma //
T02D2176:33a-16: rlung ni las kyi sems dpa' yin //
T02D2176:33a-17: de la sogs pa'i man ngag rnams //
T02D2176:33a-18: slob dpon zhal las shes par bya //
T02D2176:33a-19: 'khor lo gsum la'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2176:33a-20: tshogs zhes bya ba mang po yin //
T02D2176:33a-21: 'khor lo zhes bya ba skor du btub //
T02D2176:33a-22: mchog ces bya ba lhan cig dga' //
T02D2176:33a-23: de ltar mchog gi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2176:33a-24: yang yang sbyang zhing bsgom par bya //
T02D2176:33a-25: mchog gi tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D2176:33a-27: // / dgug pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2176:33a-28: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2176:33a-29: thun mong tshogs 'khor dang mthun no //
T02D2176:33a-30: khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni //
T02D2176:33a-31: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2176:33a-32: shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon nas //
T02D2176:33a-33: nub phyogs su ni kha bltas te //
T02D2176:33a-34: cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed nas //
T02D2176:33a-36: bskyed pa h'um gis bskyed pa dang //
T02D2176:33a-37: mi bskyed skad cig sprul pa'o //
T02D2176:33a-38: ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs sogs //
T02D2176:33a-39: byas nas bskyed rim mthar phyin nas //
T02D2176:33a-40: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor sprul pa la //
T02D2176:33a-41: cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas nas //
T02D2176:33a-42: dur khrod ras ma dag la ni //
T02D2176:33a-43: mdun du gzugs sam 'khor lo bri //
T02D2176:33a-44: dgug pa'i yi ge'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2176:33a-45: bsgrub bya bkug nas bstim par bya //
T02D2176:33a-47: dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag la //
T02D2176:33a-48: mchod bstod la sogs byas nas ni //
T02D2176:33a-49: phrin las bcol zhing rbad pa dang //
T02D2176:33a-50: sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad du ni //
T02D2176:33a-51: rab kyis bya ba 'bring gis ni //
T02D2176:33a-52: lnga brgya tha ma stong gis ni //
T02D2176:33b-0: @33b bzhi po rab tu re re yang //
T02D2176:33b-1: de bzhin gcig gis 'grub pa dang //
T02D2176:33b-2: yang na thun par bzhi dag tu //
T02D2176:33b-3: rtsa gcig lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad //
T02D2176:33b-4: de lta'i 'khor lo rtsa gcig dang //
T02D2176:33b-5: lnga bcu brgya rtsa brgyad du ni //
T02D2176:33b-6: sgrub po khyad par rab 'bring gis //
T02D2176:33b-7: bsgrub bya gang yin khug par 'gyur //
T02D2176:33b-8: nyi shu rtsa drug mtha' la ni //
T02D2176:33b-9: bsgrub bya'i ming ni bcug nas su //
T02D2176:33b-10: 'gugs byed bsre bas gzhug par bya //
T02D2176:33b-11: dgug pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka la //
T02D2176:33b-12: nyin dang mtshan du brtsam par bya //
T02D2176:33b-13: dgug pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o /
T02D2176:33b-15: // / bskrad pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2176:33b-16: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2176:33b-17: phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun //
T02D2176:33b-18: khyad par 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2176:33b-19: lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te //
T02D2176:33b-20: sngon po la sogs gos gon la //
T02D2176:33b-21: bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang //
T02D2176:33b-22: cho ga gsum gyis bya ba yin //
T02D2176:33b-23: de nas ye shes spyan drangs nas //
T02D2176:33b-24: cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya //
T02D2176:33b-25: mdun du dur khrod ras ma la //
T02D2176:33b-26: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris nas ni //
T02D2176:33b-27: de steng zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2176:33b-28: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bris nas ni //
T02D2176:33b-30: yang na gtso bo lnga'am drag po gnyis //
T02D2176:33b-31: las la med du mi rung ngo //
T02D2176:33b-32: gtso bo drag po'i las ni bsdus //
T02D2176:33b-33: slob dpon gnyis po shin tu bsdus /
T02D2176:33b-34: dkyil 'khor gsum po sprul pa las //
T02D2176:33b-35: cho ga la sogs rdzogs par bya //
T02D2176:33b-36: tshogs kyi rdzas rnams ma lus bsags //
T02D2176:33b-37: khyad par tsitta sna tshogs dang //
T02D2176:33b-38: sha sna khrag sna la sogs pas //
T02D2176:33b-39: tshul khrims bsrung ldan nas bzung nas //
T02D2176:33b-40: sgo mangs can ni yan chod kyi //
T02D2176:33b-41: rang gi sbyor ba ma byas par //
T02D2176:33b-42: gzhan la nyos dang bslangs pa yis //
T02D2176:33b-43: rdzas rnams rdo rje can gyis ni //
T02D2176:33b-44: rgyud las bsngags par bcom ldan gsungs //
T02D2176:33b-45: byan pos btso bsreg byas nas ni //
T02D2176:33b-46: yon bdag 'khor dang bcas nas ni ;
T02D2176:33b-47: / bskor ba bdun nam gsum byas la //
T02D2176:33b-49: slob dpon la ni rdo rje'i glus //
T02D2176:33b-50: phyag rgya bsgyur nas drang bar bya //
T02D2176:33b-51: h'um bla ma rdo rje slob dpon ni //
T02D2176:33b-52: gnyis med ye shes mthu ldan pas //
T02D2176:33b-53: dbyings las ma g-yos rtogs med kyang //
T02D2176:34a-1: can gdul ba'i don slad du //
T02D2176:34a-2: rdo rje can gyi sku sprul nas //
T02D2176:34a-3: rtse gcig ldan pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2176:34a-5: bdag gzhan lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2176:34a-6: byin gyis brlab ba mdzad du gsol //
T02D2176:34a-7: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis //
T02D2176:34a-8: yi ge gsum gyi bdud rtsi yis //
T02D2176:34a-9: bsreg sbyangs bdud rtsi zhu nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-10: bde gshegs mchod bstod rdzogs byas nas //
T02D2176:34a-11: phrin las bcol bas khro bo yi //
T02D2176:34a-12: sngags bzlas pas ni bsgrub bya ste //
T02D2176:34a-14: bsgrub bya de ru bzhag nas su //
T02D2176:34a-15: khro bo dpag med spros pa yi ;
T02D2176:34a-16: / zhal nas rlung nag 'tshub ma ni //
T02D2176:34a-17: btang bas bsgrub bya bteg nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-18: nub byang mtshams kyi rlung lhas ni //
T02D2176:34a-19: khyad par de nyid bskyod nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-20: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs sa ru bskyal //
T02D2176:34a-21: de ltar lan gsum lha gsum gyis //
T02D2176:34a-22: cho ga byas te bskyal bar bya //
T02D2176:34a-23: bskrad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o /
T02D2176:34a-25: // / mnan pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2176:34a-26: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2176:34a-27: phan gdags pa ni nyid dang mthun //
T02D2176:34a-28: khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni //
T02D2176:34a-29: ri bo dben pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2176:34a-30: slob dpon lho phyogs kha bltas te //
T02D2176:34a-31: ser nag la sogs rgyan cha gon //
T02D2176:34a-32: cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02D2176:34a-33: rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni //
T02D2176:34a-34: dur khrod ras ma dag la ni //
T02D2176:34a-35: ba bla'am ldong ros khu bas sam //
T02D2176:34a-36: gser gyis ri rab bris nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-37: de 'og mthing shun dag gis ni //
T02D2176:34a-38: rgya mtsho chen po'i gzugs bris la //
T02D2176:34a-39: de gnyis dag gi bar du ni //
T02D2176:34a-40: bsgrub bya'i ming rnams bris nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-41: shugs ldan pa dang mgo 'chos dang //
T02D2176:34a-42: kun du rgyug pa yan chod kyi //
T02D2176:34a-43: rnam gsum po ni thams cad kun //
T02D2176:34a-44: chos mthun spyod pas btsal nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-45: byan po de rdzogs rdzas rnams la //
T02D2176:34a-46: yid 'ong dpag med bshams nas kyang //
T02D2176:34a-47: bskor nas slob dpon la phul bas //
T02D2176:34a-48: cho ga la sogs rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2176:34a-49: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D2176:34a-50: sngags bzlas brgya rtsa brgyad pa gnyis //
T02D2176:34a-51: ting 'dzin ldan pas bsgrub bya ste //
T02D2176:34a-52: ming gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2176:34b-0: yi ge gnyis po ri @34b rab bri //
T02D2176:34b-1: rgya mtsho bskyed nas mnan par bya //
T02D2176:34b-2: dkyil 'khor mtha' ma'i cho ga yis //
T02D2176:34b-3: khang pa'i phyi rol dag tu ni //
T02D2176:34b-4: drag po'i 'brub khung byas nas kyang //
T02D2176:34b-5: nag pos kha ni bcad nas kyang //
T02D2176:34b-6: de steng las kyi rgya gram bri //
T02D2176:34b-7: de sogs cho ga'i sbyor bas su //
T02D2176:34b-8: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis mnan par bya'o //
T02D2176:34b-9: mnan pa'i chogs kyi sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o /
T02D2176:34b-11: // / gsad pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor ka ni //
T02D2176:34b-12: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2176:34b-13: phan gdags pa dang mthun par bsam //
T02D2176:34b-14: khyad par cho ga bstan pa ni //
T02D2176:34b-15: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2176:34b-16: slob dpon lho phyogs kha bltas te //
T02D2176:34b-17: gnag cing drag po'i rgyan cha gon //
T02D2176:34b-18: rnal 'byor rnams kyi mdun du ni //
T02D2176:34b-19: dur khrod ras la gzugs bris la //
T02D2176:34b-20: phur bu gri gug mtshon cha rnams //
T02D2176:34b-21: khro bo'i sngags kyis byin brlabs nas //
T02D2176:34b-22: phur bus gdab cing gri gug gtub //
T02D2176:34b-23: thun mong rdzas rnams steng du ni //
T02D2176:34b-24: gdong pa can ni sna tshogs kyis //
T02D2176:34b-25: gsum dang ldan pa yid du 'ong //
T02D2176:34b-26: slob dpon la ni phul nas kyang //
T02D2176:34b-27: dang po bsgrub bya de nyid la //
T02D2176:34b-28: bkug nas khro bo'i mtshon cha yis //
T02D2176:34b-29: gsang ba'i cho ga byas nas su //
T02D2176:34b-30: rtsa gcig la sogs sngags kyis ni //
T02D2176:34b-31: de bzhin byin brlabs byas nas ni //
T02D2176:34b-32: dang po 'khor lo mchod nas kyang //
T02D2176:34b-33: cho ga la sogs rdzogs byas la //
T02D2176:34b-34: slar yang bsgrub bya bkug nas ni //
T02D2176:34b-35: mdun bsams gsad pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2176:34b-36: cho ga rdzogs nas tha ma ni //
T02D2176:34b-37: mkha' 'gro ma yis gsad pa yi //
T02D2176:34b-38: sbyor bas cho ga rdzogs par bya'o ;
T02D2176:34b-39: ; gsad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o /
T02D2176:34b-41: // / sreg pa tshogs kyi sbyor ka ni //
T02D2176:34b-42: cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2176:34b-43: dkyil 'khor gsum du sbyin sreg gsum //
T02D2176:34b-44: rnal 'byor pa ni thams cad kyis //
T02D2176:34b-45: sngags la sogs pa'i 'khor lo yis //
T02D2176:34b-46: bskor ba'i tshul du tha ma ni //
T02D2176:34b-47: las mkhan gyis ni bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2176:34b-48: de yi cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2176:34b-49: sbyin sreg cho gar shes par bya'o //
T02D2176:34b-50: sreg pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste bdun pa'o /
T02D2176:34b-52: // / bstabs pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo ni //
T02D2176:34b-53: cho ga thams cad gzhan dang mthun //
T02D2176:35a-2: rnam par bam pa ma yin pa'i //
T02D2176:35a-3: mtshan ldan bam chen blangs nas ni //
T02D2176:35a-4: ming gi yi ge bskyed nas kyang //
T02D2176:35a-5: de nyid dkyil 'khor gsum po la //
T02D2176:35a-6: bstabs te yang na rdzas la ni //
T02D2176:35a-7: bsams te byin brlabs byas nas kyang //
T02D2176:35a-8: gar ma dbyug sngon rta mgrin gyis //
T02D2176:35a-9: lan gsum lan bdun nyi shu gcig / bstabs pa'i tshogs ni mkhas pas so //
T02D2176:35a-10: de nas phyi rol dag tu bya //
T02D2176:35a-11: de ltar gnyis bstabs gsum du bstabs //
T02D2176:35a-12: slob dpon man ngag shes par bya'o //
T02D2176:35a-13: bstabs pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o /
T02D2176:35a-15: // / thun gsum thun bzhi dag tu ni //
T02D2176:35a-16: nyin dang mtshan ni lan gsum du //
T02D2176:35a-17: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ka la //
T02D2176:35a-18: rnal 'byor can gyis brtson par bya'o //
T02D2176:35a-19: dngos grub rnam gnyis 'dod pa dang //
T02D2176:35a-20: bar chad rnam gnyis bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2176:35a-21: cho ga 'di byas dge bas su //
T02D2176:35a-22: thams cad byang chub thob par shog / tshogs kyi
T02D2176:35a-23: 'khor lo'i sbyor ka slob dpon bha bas mdzad pa
